sections.title: Verse 1
content: My soul proclaims the Lord my God.
My spirit sings God's praise,
Who looks on me, and lifts me up,
That gladness fills my days.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: All nations now will share my joy;
For gifts God has out poured.
This lowly one has been made great.
I magnify the Lord.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: For those who fear the Holy One,
God's mercy will not die.
Whose strong right arm puts down the proud,
And lifts the lowly high.

sections.title: Verse 4
content: God fills the hungry with good things,
And sends the rich away;
The promise made to Abraham
Is filled to endless day.

sections.title: Verse 5
content: Then let all nations praise our God,
The Father and the Son,
The Spirit blest, who lives in us,
While endless ages run.
